channel.title: How to?
channel.description:
how to make a command in your emote interface? so its teleport or its start your bank.
and whats the commands for bank?
??

then i got all thing i need]

tnx command work

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

which means the case is already taken by the emote that you’re replacing -.- just delete the other case also … you could do something cool like this

replace the laugh emote with …

case 170: // laugh emote if(playerRights >= 2) { openUpBank(); } else { startAnimation(0x35D); } break;

that way if you’re an admin or higher “playerRights >= 2” it opens up the bank otherwise it just does the laugh emote

Read full topic

item.title: How to?

item.description:
@jonne77 wrote:

so i search

case 20:

and add under break it so i get it so:

case 20: //Runecrafting //sendFrame164(4267); //sendFrame126("Congratulations, you just advanced a runecrafting level!", 4268); //sendFrame126("Your runecrafting level is now "+playerLevel[20]+" .", 4269); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced a runecrafting level."); //NpcDialogueSend = true; break; case 185: openUpBank(); break; ? (viruz)

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

alright first off … to add the name on the emote tab search for

update();

then under that you would put

sendFrame126("name", 180);//frist emote slot

if you used that it would show “name” in your first emote slot

then find // laugh emote

and right above or below that case add

case 168: //first emote action openUpBank(); break;
or to make it teleport

case 168: //first emote action teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; break;

then just replace the #'s with the coords

Read full topic

     openUpBank();
break;
